title.rendered: South Dakota School of Mines & Technology

content.rendered:
South Dakota School of Mines & Technology Spring 2023 Career Fair

Tuesday, February 7, 2023

11:00 AM – 4:00 PM

King Center – South Dakota Mines

Held once each semester, fall and spring, the South Dakota Mines Career Fair connects over 2,000 students with 219 employers nationwide (about a fourth from South Dakota, the rest from across the United States). Many employers recruit on our campus every year, but each Career Fair also sees new participants looking to recruit South Dakota Mines job seeking students. Many employers conduct next-day interviews with students.

 

For more information, please visit South Dakota School of Mines Career Fair site.
